conversations.body_text: Hi Vaughn_Hudaj,    I apologize for bothering you again, but we need to confirm once more that there is no building number or room number.

The address is correct.

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 3:47 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Vaughn_Hudaj,    Alright, thank you for your confirmation. We'll ship your order as soon as possible.

Do you have any idea when this will be shipped?

On Thu, Dec 4, 2025 at 3:51 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Vaughn_Hudaj,  I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it?
